Label (required): Did the additional designated reviewer(s) for the written procedures provide any recommended changes to the policy document?
Choices (required*, see documentation): Yes – I uploaded the updated final version of the document with any recommended changes on the Update Files tab, No – no changes to the document were needed

Label (required): Comments from all reviewers of the written procedures:
Help Text (optional): Note: The additional reviewer(s) is someone other than the business unit owner and its Administrator, that was designated to review the written procedures. If there were no changes suggested, indicate “Not applicable.”
